The arithmetic mean of the nine numbers in the set $ \{9,99,999,9999, . . . ,999999999\}$ is a $ 9$-digit number $ M$, all of whose digits are distinct. The number $ M$ does not contain the digit\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 0 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 2 \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 4 \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 6 \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 8$
